facialFeatures.exactEyeColorAndShape: The eyes are a rich, deep brown, almost ebony, with a slight almond shape, moderately hooded eyelids, and full, dark lashes that frame them beautifully.
facialFeatures.distinctNoseStructure: The nose features a straight bridge of medium width, flaring slightly to well-proportioned nostrils, and a rounded, subtly prominent tip.
facialFeatures.lipFullnessAndShape: His lips are moderately full with a well-defined cupid's bow, the corners turn slightly upward, showcasing a warm, inviting natural pink hue with a smooth texture.
facialFeatures.subtleWrinklesOrLines: There are minimal lines, mainly a few subtle laugh lines around the mouth and a smooth forehead, indicating youthful skin.
facialFeatures.cheekboneProminence: Cheekbones are distinctly high and well-defined, casting soft shadows under the cheeks, enhancing his facial structure.
facialFeatures.jawlineDefinition: The jawline is sharp and well-defined, angling neatly down from the ear to a firm chin, giving his face a strong, determined look.

hair.preciseColor: His hair is a glossy jet black, uniformly colored without any visible highlights or variations, closely cropped to his head, showing a clean and neat appearance.
hair.exactStyleAndCut: The hairstyle is a close buzz cut, evenly trimmed around the head, approximately a quarter inch in length, offering a tidy and low-maintenance look.
hair.texture: The hair texture appears very fine and tightly coiled, indicative of an African descent, showing a healthy sheen and uniformity throughout.
hair.flyawaysOrSpecificStrands: Due to the close crop of the buzz cut, there are no flyaways or loose strands; the hair is immaculately groomed.

skin.skinTone: The skin tone is a rich, deep bronze with warm undertones, smooth and even across visible areas, reflecting a healthy, radiant complexion.
skin.presenceOfFrecklesMolesScars: There are no visible freckles, moles, or scars on the exposed areas of his face and neck, indicating clear skin.
skin.skinTexture: The skin texture is notably smooth and matte, with very fine pores that are barely visible, giving a well-cared-for appearance.

buildAndPosture.exactBodyType: He has a muscular build, with broad shoulders and a visibly toned chest, indicative of regular physical activity and strength training.
buildAndPosture.typicalPosture: His posture is upright and confident, with shoulders back and a slight forward lean, suggesting a dynamic and energetic personality.

clothingAndAccessories.specificGarmentTypesAndFit: He wears a vibrant red-orange button-up shirt, tailored to fit snugly around his muscular torso, with sleeves rolled up to the elbows, revealing his forearms.
clothingAndAccessories.fabricTextures: The shirt is made of a lightweight, breathable cotton blend, exhibiting a slight sheen under sunlight, and drapes well over his physique.
clothingAndAccessories.specificDetails: The shirt features pearlescent buttons, double stitching along the seams, and a sharp, stiff collar, adding a touch of elegance to a casual outfit.
clothingAndAccessories.jewelry: He wears a simple, dark leather bracelet on his left wrist, understated yet stylish.

demeanorAndExpressions.recurringMicroExpressions: His expression is focused and thoughtful, with a slight furrowing of his brow and a gentle parting of lips, reflecting a contemplative and artistic nature.
demeanorAndExpressions.feelOfTheirPresence: Elias exudes a calm, approachable aura, combined with an underlying strength and confidence, making him seem both friendly and inspiring.

voiceProfileSelection.voiceDescription: A smooth, melodious baritone that flows effortlessly, reflecting his artistic soul and resonating with a warm, inviting timbre.
voiceProfileSelection.selectionReasoning: His artistic demeanor, combined with the gentle expressions and confident posture, aligns perfectly with a voice that is both soothing and expressive.

veo3Consistency.wardrobe: Maintain vibrant, well-fitted shirts in various colors, always with rolled-up sleeves to emphasize his muscular build and casual, artistic style.
veo3Consistency.physicalTraits: Consistent portrayal of his deep bronze skin tone, muscular build, and neatly groomed hair to maintain character integrity across scenes.
veo3Consistency.mannerisms: Frequent thoughtful expressions, gentle hand gestures while speaking or playing the guitar, and a confident, upright posture.

template.cinematicStyle: A vibrant, dynamic cinematographic style with plenty of natural light to enhance his skin tone and the vivid colors of his wardrobe, using close-ups to capture expressions and wide shots to include body language.
